attributes.action: face the fact that the education provisions for special needs children is flawed in many ways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a mother of a son with Autism, I have had to fight for over 2 years for my son to get the education he deserved, for him and thousands of other special needs children, mainstream inclusion is not working, in fact it is damaging our children.

The 'Help Us Help Them' Campaign is asking the Government to listen to the parents and stop our special needs children from being bullied, emotionally hurt and made to feel like they 'dont matter'
The Government said that 'Every child matters', well prove to us thay they do.
I have already been interviewed by various newspaper and also by ITN. Watch this space.  This campaign will go all the way.
